subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick Tocchet lost his debut as the Tampa Bay Lightning coach on Sunday, when the host Carolina Hurricanes recovered from a two-goal deficit to pull out a 3-2 victory in a shootout.
snippet: Rick Tocchet lost his debut as the Tampa Bay Lightning coach on Sunday, when the host Carolina Hurricanes recovered from a two-goal deficit to pull out a 3-2 victory in a shootout.
